comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Barns of the World., and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 34349629@N06
comment._content:
This is not a barn.
It is a boathouse and a fishermans hut in Lauksund on the island of Brakøya, Raftsund, Lofoten.
